ccre.cluck.tcp

Class CluckTCPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ccre.concurrency.ReporterThread
        • ccre.cluck.tcp.CluckTCPClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CluckTCPClient
extends ReporterThread
    A self-maintaining handler for connecting to a specified remote address.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CluckTCPClient(java.lang.String remote, CluckNode node, java.lang.String linkName, java.lang.String remoteNameHint)
      Create a new CluckTCPClient connecting to the specified remote on the default port, sharing the specified CluckNode, with the specified link name and hint for what the other end should call this link.

              CluckNode node,
              java.lang.String linkName,

        Create a new CluckTCPClient connecting to the specified remote on the default port, sharing the specified CluckNode, with the specified link name and hint for what the other end should call this link.
        Parameters:
        remote - The remote address.
        node - The shared node.
        linkName - The link name.
        remoteNameHint - The hint for what the other end should call this link.
